actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 41 of title 38, United States Code, to improve job counseling and employment services for veterans.

summary.text: Creates, within the Department of Labor, the Veterans' Employment Service, to be headed by the Assistant Secretary of Labor for Veterans' Employment. Authorizes the Assistant Secretary to assign to each State a Federal veterans' employment representative to assist in job counseling for veterans, to provide employment services, and to help improve working conditions, particularly in regard to disabled veterans. Transfers the duties and responsibilities of the Secretary of Labor in the areas of veterans' job counseling and placement to the Assistant Secretary of Labor for Veterans' Employment. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 2002-05)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 41 of title 38, United States Code, to improve job counseling and employment services for veterans.
